## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.SET\_MODEL\_SCALE" property

Emitted when the scale of the entity's model is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.SET_MODEL_SCALE]: {
        entity: Entity;
        modelScale: number;
    };
```
